Class AbstractGlove

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cs495.engine.game.AbstractGameObject

  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PrimaryLavaGlove, PrimaryMagicGlove, SecondaryFireGlove, SecondaryFrostGlove, SecondaryIceGlove

    public abstract class AbstractGlove
extends AbstractArmor

      • AbstractGlove

        public AbstractGlove(java.lang.String name,
                     AbstractArmor.ArmorType armorType,
                     AbstractGlove.GloveMode gloveMode,
                     float cooldown,
                     int baseDamage,
                     int damageReduction,
                     java.lang.String imagePath,
                     java.lang.String iconPath)
        Initialize a glove
        Parameters:
        name - - the name of the glove
        projectile - - the launched item
        gloveType - - the type of the glove
        gloveMode - - the firing mode of the glove
        cooldown - - the cooldown of the glove
        baseDamage - - the damage per projectile
        damageReduction - - the defence that is offered by the glove
        imagePath - - the path of the glove image file
        iconPath - - the icon path
        offX - - the x offset to the player's position
        offY - - the y offset to the player's position
